pr_title: Changed some things to public (from protected)

timeline.message: Changed get and set scripts to public (from protected)

timeline.bodyText: Don't open things up that don't have sufficient parameter validation, the @Nonnull is not enforced here because it was an internal method, so you'd need to add a Validate call here.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: Don't open things up that don't have sufficient parameter validation, the @Nonnull is not enforced here because it was an internal method, so you'd need to add a Validate call here.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText: As I already said, so addons can modify android code
replies.author: Seggan

replies.bodyText: I plan to generate an Instruction[] in my addon code, then turn it into a string that the android recognises
replies.author: Seggan

replies.bodyText: Okay, I thought you meant adding more Instructions, because for that we would need an interface (which we should add at some point anyway)
replies.author: TheBusyBiscuit
